feature.label: ABAP Tags
feature.description: Provides tools for ABAP Tags Management - Custom Dialog to manage ABAP Tags - New Wizard to add Tags to Repository Objects - New Search Page in Search View to search for Tagged Objects - New View to manage Tags of a Repository Object
